index.title: wBAN is Wrapped Banano
index.what-can-you-do: What can you do with wBAN?
index.swap-with-other-crypto-description: Swap from BAN to wBAN to your preferred crypto or vice-versa
index.earn-some-wban-description: Earn extra wBAN by providing liquidity to pools
index.learn-defi-description: Without risking much of your hard earned BAN

setup.from-ban-description: I have Banano and want to start learning DeFi with wBAN.
setup.from-wban-description: I have wBAN and want to use the Banano network.
setup.reconnect-bridge-description: I already did the setup and want to connect from a new device.
setup.swaps-only-description: I will do the bridge setup later when I need to wrap or unwrap.
setup.verify-ban-address: We need to verify your BAN address!
setup.verify-ban-address-explanation: This step is important as it ensures that you control the BAN wallet interacting with wBAN.

step1.title: Setup a Banano Wallet
step1.phrase1: For the best user experience, we recommend using the Kalium mobile wallet:
step1.phrase2: If you prefer to use a web wallet, then {0} web wallet is the next best choice.
step1.phrase3: Click "Continue" button when you have created your wallet.

step2.title: Get some free Banano
step2.phrase1: You need some BAN to do the bridge setup.
step2.phrase2: Banano has multiple faucets giving some BAN for free, like:
step2.phrase3: Click "Continue" button when you have at least 0.01 BAN in your wallet.

step4.title: Claim your address
step4.phrase1: Please verify that your Banano address is indeed
step4.phrase2: This is important as we will link your Banano address with your {network} one.

step5.title: Make a Banano deposit
step5.phrase2: you need to confirm your claim by sending a BAN deposit from this Banano wallet to this one
step5.phrase4: Although any amount would be fine, let's be safe and transfer 0.01 BAN.
step5.phrase5: Don't worry this deposit will be available for withdrawal if you want so.

bridge.button-withdraw-ban-tooltip: Withdraw BAN back to your wallet

history.title: History
history.title-tooltip: History: see your past transactions and claim previously rejected transactions

farms.farms-ended-tooltip: Old farms not distributing rewards anymore!
farms.warning-no-farm-running-on-network: No farm running on {network}. Check on other networks.
farms.warning-deposits-left-in-ended-farm: You have some deposits left in ended farms. Please withdraw!

nft-rewards.airdrop-claim: You have been airdropped and you can claim some free NFTs.
nft-rewards.golden-missing: You are missing only a single NFT in order to claim a golden one.
nft-rewards.claim-golden: You have enough NFTs in order to claim a golden NFT.
nft-rewards.warning1: wBAN NFTs are only available on Polygon network.
nft-rewards.warning2: Please switch to the proper network.

wrap-form.gasless-wrap-lacking-ban: If you deposit {0} more BAN, you can get a gasless wrap.
wrap-form.gasless-wrap: You can wrap with no transaction fee if at least {0} BAN.

wrap-input.error-amount-more-than-zero: Amount should be more than zero

swap-form.slippage-tolerance-tooltip: This is maximum percentage you are willing to lose due to unfavorable price changes.
swap-form.allowance-tooltip:
Amount of {fromSymbol} the exchange can move on your behalf.

Exact Amount: Approve each time, safer but less convenient.
Unlimited: Approve only once, more convenient but less safe.
swap-form.gasless-swap: If you swap at least {amount} wBAN to {crypto}, there will be no transaction fee.

token-input.error-amount-more-than-zero: Amount should be more than zero

statistics.title: wBAN Statistics
statistics.total-supply-tooltip: Number of wBAN that have been created from associated BAN deposits

farm.zap-in-process-phrase1: This is a two steps process:
farm.zap-in-process-phrase3: Deposit your liquidity pool tokens into the farm
farm.zap-out-hint: After withdrawing liquidity pool tokens from the farm, you will be able to easily remove liquidity and zap out to either {symbol1} or {symbol2}.
farm.button-deposit-tooltip: When adding your liquidity tokens into the farm, you harvest your wBAN earned as well!
farm.button-withdraw-tooltip: When withdrawing your liquidity tokens from the farm, you harvest your wBAN earned as well!

ban-deposit.title: BAN Deposits
ban-deposit.phrase1: If you want to swap more BAN, simply send some BAN from your {0} wallet to this wallet:
ban-deposit.phrase2:
Don't send amounts with more than 2 decimals and make sure there is no raw.
Using "Max" link in Kalium is probably not going to work well.
If you don't follow the previous rule, your BAN will be sent back to the wallet you sent them from. Make sure you don't withdraw from a CEX straight to this address or you may lose your BAN!

gas-needed.title: Running low on {crypto} for fees
gas-needed.phrase1: Your current balance of {balance} {crypto} is too low for wrapping.
gas-needed.phrase2: {network} does not need a lot of {crypto} for transaction fees, but it is best to buy at least {minimumNeededForWrap} {crypto} and send them to this wallet.

low-amount-to-wrap.phrase1: You are requesting to wrap/unwrap a ü§è amount of {amount} BAN/wBAN.
low-amount-to-wrap.phrase2: {network} network fees may not be worth it for this wrap/unwrap.

nft.title: Claim your NFTs
nft.proceed: You have {count} NFT to claim. Proceed?

nft-rewards.title: Claim Golden NFT
nft-rewards.phrase1: You have the required NFTs in order to claim a Golden {name} NFT.
nft-rewards.phrase2: Doing so will burn/destroy your three {name} NFTs and give you the Golden {name} NFT instead.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal in progress...
withdrawal.message: Working hard to process your withdrawal!

pending-withdrawal.title: Pending Withdrawal
pending-withdrawal.message:
Your withdrawal of {amount} BAN can't be processed right now.

It has been put in a pending list and will be processed later!

Meanwhile your deposited BAN balance won't be reduced from this withdrawal.

wrap.title: Wrap of {amount} BAN in progress...
wrap.message: Working hard to process your wrap request!

unwrap.title: Unwrap of {amount} wBAN in progress...
unwrap.message: Working hard to process your unwrap request!

farm-zap.title: Zap of {amount} {symbol} in progress...
farm-zap.message: Working hard to process your request!

farm-deposit.title: Deposit of {amount} {symbol} in progress...
farm-deposit.message: Working hard to process your supply request!

farm-withdraw.title: Withdrawal of {amount} {symbol} in progress...
farm-withdraw.message: Working hard to process your withdrawal request!

unsupported-network.title: Unsupported network {network}
unsupported-network.message:
wBAN is only available on BSC, Polygon, Fantom, Ethereum and Arbitrum.

Please switch to one of those networks.

notifications.token-approval-success: Your token approval was processed succesfully.
notifications.token-approval-error: Your token approval couldn't be processed.

ban-deposit-confirmed.message: Your deposit of {amount} BAN was received.
ban-deposit-confirmed.caption: You can swap it to wBAN.

ban-deposit-declined.message: Your deposit of {amount} BAN was rejected.
ban-deposit-declined.caption: Make sure you don't send amounts with more than 2 decimals or with raw values.

notifications.withdrawal: {amount} BAN were sent back to your wallet.

pending-withdrawal.message: Your withdrawal of {amount} BAN is in pending state.
pending-withdrawal.caption: As soon as wBAN hot wallet is refilled from its cold wallet your withdrawal will be done!

notifications.wrap: Your swap of {amount} BAN was processed succesfully.

wrap-error.message: Your wrap of {amount} BAN couldn't be processed.
wrap-error.caption: Go to the history page and click on the claim button associated to the wrap request.

unwrap.message: Your unwrap of {amount} wBAN was processed succesfully.
unwrap.caption: Your balance of deposited Banano has been updated.

notifications.farm-zap-in:
Your zap of {amount} {symbol} was processed succesfully.
Don't forget to deposit your liquidity now!
notifications.farm-zap-out: Your zap of {amount} {symbol} was processed succesfully.
notifications.farm-deposit: Your deposit of {amount} {symbol} was processed succesfully.
notifications.farm-withdraw: Your withdrawal of {amount} {symbol} was processed succesfully.

donations.title: Donations
donations.phrase1: Working on this app has been quite a journey, and still going on!
donations.phrase2: Tips are always appreciated and if you would like to support my efforts, you can always help me by sending Banano tips at:
